Description: Model sandal for the right foot, made of wood and painted white, with rounded toe, tenon at toe and heel for attachment of straps, now missing.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Original photograph AN404207001 taken by Adrianus t'Hooft and copyright assigned to the Museum.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 220)
